articles.title: Strong Solar Flare Could Trigger Auroras on Earth – In Time for Diwali in India - The Wire Science
articles.description: A strong solar flare erupted earlier this week that could affect GPS and communication satellites in the coming days, and also cause auroras in Europe and North America.
articles.content:
Representative image: The Sun emitting a significant solar flare in December 2014. Image: NASA Solar Dynamics Observatory

articles.title: Apple software exec warns European app store regulation would open 'Pandora’s box’ - CNBC
articles.description: The remarks represent an escalation in Apple's rhetoric about what could go wrong if Apple was forced to change its App Store policies.
articles.content: Proposed European regulation that could force Apple to allow iPhone users to install software from the web would open '"Pandora's box" and could pose threats to entire networks of computers, Apple so… [+4169 chars]

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Champions League LIVE: Real Madrid vs Shakhtar Donetsk, Man City vs Club Brugge, Liverpool vs Atletico Madrid, RB Leipzig vs PSG and all the action - Goal India
articles.description: A new Champions League campaign kicked off in September with 32 teams vying to take Chelsea's crown as the best team in European soccer. The final will be played on May 28, 2022.
